name: ssr-wa-compare
description: Testing WebAwesome component library with Svelte/SvelteKit SSR and reactivity

scripts.dev:all: concurrently --names "POC1,POC2,POC3,POC4,POC5,POC6,POC7,POC8" -c "cyan,magenta,green,yellow,blue,red,white,gray" "npm run dev:01" "npm run dev:02" "npm run dev:03" "npm run dev:04" "npm run dev:05" "npm run dev:06" "npm run dev:07" "npm run dev:08"
scripts.open:all: open-cli http://localhost:5001 http://localhost:5002 http://localhost:5003 http://localhost:5004 http://localhost:5005 http://localhost:5006 http://localhost:5007 http://localhost:5008
